title: Portfolio Website
fullDescription: The Portfolio Project is a fully responsive personal website built using React.js, designed to showcase my work, skills, projects, and contact google form. It serves as a digital resume and professional identity for developers.

title: Flight Management API
fullDescription: The Flight Management API is a robust and secure backend system designed to manage airline operations, including flight scheduling, booking, and administration. Built using ASP.NET Core Web API in C#, this RESTful API provides endpoints for managing flights, passengers, and bookings, with secure access and role-based authorization.
